name: Bold Health
slogan: The leading Digital Therapeutics For Digestive Health
description: Bold Health creates digital therapeutics with the aim of treating under-served chronic conditions better, with an integrative approach combining scientifically proven behavioural, lifestyle and pharmacological interventions, and empowering the patient to self-care for long term results.

team.name: Jossy Onwude, MD
team.bioHtml: Medical doctor and Health Informatician.Fellow Australasian college of health informatics.Digital Health Expert

jobs.title: Bold Health Research Fellowship
jobs.description:
We are looking for a Research Fellow to join Bold Health. This is a full-time role for 12-18 months; however, where individuals are unable to commit to a full-time role, we welcome discussions about other options. We envisage that the researcher may maintain an ongoing relationship with their existing/previous research organization.

Note: We may be able to increase the number of Research Fellowships where researchers have financial support from their existing organizations (e.g. for university researchers, this could be through Impact Acceleration Accounts).

The role(s) will involve:
Translating published research about interventions for our various disease pipeline into digestible summaries, mobilizing and gathering input from experts (e.g. through roundtable discussions, calls & meetings), and identifying pressing questions & priority areas, based on expert consultation and research.


Working hands-on to ground our thinking in scientific insight, holding expert review panels, opening up new user research channels, and building partnerships with academics & universities to facilitate collaboration with Bold Health

Writing Clinical protocols/Study design and running our clinical trials along with the medical people on the team and experts

Disseminating learning from User testing, Feasibility studies, and Clinical trials through publications and reports (open-access), identifying gaps & priorities for new research, and building on university collaborations by helping to support with funding co-bids, etc.

jobs.title: Marketing & Community Manager
jobs.description:
We’re on a mission to help people with gut health challenges manage their symptoms better so they can live Boldly  - starting with Irritable Bowel Syndrome(IBS). We develop digital therapeutics for gut health problems and diseases. We do this by leveraging behavioral medicine and machine learning to deliver personalized, self-driven, highly effective treatments to our users. We’re not just building a business, our mission is to improve the health and better the quality of life of people living with gut disorders and diseases.

Bold Health is a leading digital therapeutics company focusing on people who experience gut diseases or disorders. We aim to improve the lives of people with gut health challenges by helping them reduce and manage their symptoms better. 

Bold Health is a leading digital therapeutics startup, committed to using technology for social impact, and backed by Zinc VC, Learn Capital, Startup Bootcamp and other leading UK-based investors. We’ve established a world-class team of specialists and medical advisors, from leading institutions like Harvard and Oxford University. Our founders have decades of experience building teams and businesses, raising capital and working with leading VCs, and navigating growth and successful exits.


The Role 
You will work closely with Bold’s CPO and CEO to develop our communications, campaigns, and community. This will include identifying opportunities to grow our reach. 
This is a perfect opportunity for someone who wants to be involved in the growth of a fast-paced high impact start-up. You must be passionate about Health and social impact. 

This is an exciting time to join the Bold Health team. We are about to launch our product and just finish a funding round. We also have exciting partnerships on the pipeline.

The successful candidate will gain a unique insight into the early stages of building a social impact startup and brand. There will also be opportunities for career development and growth, including access to a brilliant network of mentors and advisors. 

Responsibilities: 
- You will lead Zemedy(our first product) social media and community activities including online engagement and physical events 
- Building our community, including playing an active role in existing communities, participating in discussions and starting new conversations 
- Developing relationships with influencers to grow the reach of the Zemedy brand 
- Acting as a bridge between our community and the product, getting their feedback and sharing what we’re building 
- Growing and managing our social media channels as well as new online/offline channels 
- Grow our content including: 
- Creating new content such as blogs and videos as well as new formats and topics that resonate with our audience 
- Finding new ways to distribute our content to get maximum engagement 
- Creating new ways to generate content from our community and share 
- Optimize content for SEO 
- Organize our events, including our digital meetup series 
- Identify, develop and run campaigns on topical issues 
- Identify influencers and find ways to engage them about our mission 
- Identify opportunities for us to play an active role in the tech, social impact, and health space
Your Qualifications 
- Experience in digital marketing - especially content creation and distribution 
- Experience of community building and management 
- Excellent content writing skills, including experience blogging or writing for online publications 
- Experience managing and growing social media following and engagement as well as engaging in online communities 
- Excellent leadership, communication (written and oral) and interpersonal skills 
- Great self-starter who can oversee projects from start to finish
